article.title: Wear Your AFCEA Membership Proudly
article.author: Maryann Lawlor, SIGNAL Connections
article.abstract: Shop!AFCEA has opened its e-doors, and members can purchase hats, jackets and shirts that include the official AFCEA logo.
article.text: AFCEANs can now display their membership in the premier organization in command, control, communications, computers, intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance with apparel that sports the AFCEA emblem. Shop!AFCEA has opened its e-doors, and members can purchase hats, jackets and shirts that include the official AFCEA logo.The website features links to women’s and men’s polo shirts, outerwear and accessories, which come in a variety of colors. Shoppers also can add their chapter’s name under the AFCEA logo using the “Add Instructions” option when ordering.Prices for the high-quality products begin at $13.99, and bulk orders of 10 or more items receive a 15 percent discount.For additional information, contact Susan Emert at (703) 631-6191.
